name: get_metro_arrivals
description: Get real-time arrival times for Madrid Metro trains at a specific station. Returns estimated arrival times, destinations, platforms, and line information.

arguments.name: line
arguments.desc: Optional: Filter by Metro line number (e.g., '8', '9', 'L8')

arguments.name: count
arguments.desc: Optional: Number of arrivals to return (default: 2, max: 10)

name: get_bus_arrivals
description: Get real-time arrival times for buses (EMT, urban, interurban) at a specific stop. Returns estimated arrival times, destinations, distances, and incident information. Requires EMT API credentials.

arguments.name: stop
arguments.desc: Stop name or number (e.g., 'Plaza de Castilla', 'Cibeles', '3000', '4521')

arguments.name: line
arguments.desc: Optional: Filter by bus line number (e.g., '27', '51', 'N1')

arguments.name: count
arguments.desc: Optional: Number of arrivals to return (default: 2, max: 10)

name: get_train_arrivals
description: Get real-time arrival times for Cercanías (commuter trains) at a station. Returns estimated arrival times, destinations, platforms, delays, and line information.

arguments.name: count
arguments.desc: Optional: Number of arrivals to return (default: 2, max: 10)
